### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) with 50 coal in its fuel inventory.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -82.0)

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with 48 coal in its fuel inventory.

### Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) with 19 coal in its fuel inventory and 1 stone in its source inventory.

### Lab at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of a lab at position (0.5, 0.5) with 50 automation science packs in its input inventory and researching automation.

### Steam Engine at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (5.5, 0.5) with several neighboring pipes and small electric poles, but not connected to a power network and with no input liquid.

### Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) with several neighboring pipes and pumping water.

### Pipe Group at position (-0.5, -2.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (-0.5, -2.5) with several pipes and a full output status.

### Pipe Group at position (5.5, 7.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (5.5, 7.5) with several pipes and an empty status.

### Pipe Group at position (-0.5, 13.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (-0.5, 13.5) with several pipes and an empty status.

### Electricity Group at id 7265
Consists of several small electric poles at different positions with a voltage of 0.

### Electricity Group at id 6985
Consists of several small electric poles at different positions with a voltage of 0.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace.
- Make sure that the furnace has space for the item you are trying to insert.

### Errors when using API
- Ensure that you are using the correct API functions and parameters to avoid errors.
- Check the documentation for the API functions you are using to ensure you are using them correctly.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile where you are trying to place the entity is not occupied by another entity.
- Make sure that you have the necessary items in your inventory to place the entity.
